title: Drug Discovery
content: Machine learning and statistical association testing
Analysis of high-throughput screens (CRISPR, RNAi, drug perturbation)
Image analysis of histology slides to identify biomarkers

title: Genomic Analyses
content: Analysis of RNA-seq from bulk and single cell samples
Identification of variants (SNPs, structural, CN) based on DNA-seq
Analysis of immune repertoire sequencing (B/T cells)
Analysis of cell-free DNA for estimating tumor fraction

title: Software Development
content: Development of cloud-based infrastructure (Google cloud, AWS)
Development of web-based interfaces for data visualization. e.g., Shiny app
Development and deployment of a  machine learning platform (PrismML) for genomics
